text: Rod (Cyrillic: Род) is the supreme God of the universe in the Slavic Native Faith. Old Church Slavonic sources about pre-Christian religion, say that Rod represents divinity and ancestrality. Among the South Slavs, the concept is also known as Sud (Judge) or Prabog (First God). == References == Category:Slavic gods and goddesses
title: Rod (Slavic religion)
